overview: Lloyd's look at married life and the issues of the in-law. Adventures include a ride on a crowded trolley with a live turkey; A wild spin in a new auto with the in-laws in tow.  Finally, a sequence in which Hubby accidentally chloroforms his mother-in-law and becomes convinced that he's killed her!
tagline: Hubby - a man who was never going to fall for a pair of soft-boiled eyes!
title: Hot Water
